mainText:
In June 1980, my parents gave me an Apple II+ (I mean, an Apple ][+ ) for my
birthday. I think I would still put it at #1 on my list of All Time Greatest
Gifts Received, ahead of the Green Machine, the Atari 2600, and my baby
brother.

Thank you, Steve Jobs. You may be the most creative, innovative businessman
in American history. You made the world a better place.
author: Drew
